title: Whitaker and Fowl
description: A police officer named Fowl teams up with a crime-fighting chicken named Whitaker.
quote: Listen, Whitaker. I’m not your sister, I’m not your girlfriend, and I’m not your priest.
altHero: a chicken, Whitaker, in a cop’s uniform
alt1: a man, Fowl sitting in a cop car with coffee cups on the dash
alt2: Whitaker sitting in the passenger seat
alt3: Fowl giving a strong talking to Whitaker
alt4: Fowl holding out a donut for Whitaker
